posts.post_content:
Hindu Ewing - SOLD
Hindu Tubby - SOLD
Piedmont 350 Ewing SOLD

Shift of focus for my collection so I have a couple of toughies available for trade.  Looking to get some EPDG’s, either ones I need or upgrades to what I have. Just let me know what you have. 

Also looking for Hindus from the 150-only group.

Please note the Tubby Hindu has the wrong flip. It was part of a sub with a Gilbert Hindu and SGC accidentally reversed the flips when tombing them. The Tubby flip shows it as an SGC 10.

Price dropped!  Forgot I still had this guy....
